about_the_game:
The morning sun spills through the storefront windows, painting the aisles with golden light.

The doors swing open, a flood of eager shoppers surges through, looking for their favorite foods and household goods.

The constant ring of the cash register means more money, which means you can invest in a bigger building, more inventory, new equipment, new employees.

Have you got the grit, the vision, and the determination to keep growing your brand?

Storefront Simulator features a full building editor – so you can lay the foundation, design the floor plan, install the shelves and checkout machines, and create a retail shopping experience of your very own.

Design a store that's as cozy as a corner café or as expansive as an open air market. Your imagination is the only limit.

From there, you’re in charge:

Become a master of inventory. Negotiate deals, stock shelves with hot commodities, and find out your best proven money-makers.
Grab your friends and get ready to grow your retail empire together! Join forces with up to 3 other players to build the ultimate shopping experience. Collaborate with your squad to design the perfect layout, manage inventory like pros, and keep your customers as happy as clams. Whether you're dividing and conquering tasks or working side-by-side for maximum efficiency, teamwork makes the dream work (and the profits soar!)

Don't be confined by four walls. Grow your footprint, annex neighboring lots, and turn a humble storefront into a sprawling commercial complex.

Build a team that's as passionate as you are. Hire and train staff who'll keep your customers grinning from ear to ear, ensuring every visit meets or exceeds expectations.

Delight your clientele with a curated selection of goods, impeccable service, and an ambiance that makes them want to come back again.

Turn a vacant lot into a retail paradise. Build a store that's just as ambitious as you are. Become a titan of industry.

Your empire awaits.

Your customers are waiting!
